examples: Too much toxic waste is being dumped at sea.
Se arrojan demasiados desechos tóxicos al mar.
The dead body was just dumped by the roadside.
El cadáver acaba de ser arrojado al borde de la carretera.
Any vessel dumping at sea without a licence will be prosecuted.
Cualquier buque que desembarque en el mar sin licencia será procesado.
He's got no right to keep dumping his problems on me.
No tiene derecho a seguir descargándome sus problemas.
